page.title: 19LEISURE-MOFFAT STYLE
page.content: Summer in Moffat is a time for outdoor pursuits.Two tennis clubs,a bowling green,an 18-hole golf course and a fine park with boating,a paddling pool and a putting green amply provide for the active.Angling and hillwalking are also popular. Winter sends most indoors.Badminton, Basketball and keep-fit are popular choices.A succesful amateur football club reflects a strong interest in Soccer.Darts is a favourite pastime with a section of the population. The Academy is a focus for pursuits as diverse as crook-making and computers.A pipe band and a school orchestra provide outlets for the musically inclined. Theatre fans are regularly entertained in The Old Well and Youth Theatres.The Wildlife Club has a very active following.
